subject: Sales IM Testing Competitions - $4,050 in prizes
body:
Hello sm1lies,

TopCoder is excited to announce two new Sales IM testing competitions with $4050 in prize money. Each of these contests will focus on implementing test cases for specific areas of the Sales IM application that is currently in assembly.  The Sales IM tool is a web based instant messaging application.
 
For the Sales IM Chat Testing Competition, the winning submission will receive $1500, while the second place team will receive $750.
 
For the Sales IM Admin Testing Competition, the winning submission will receive $1200, while the second place team will receive $600.
 
Contest details can be found here:
http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=dev&d2=testing&d3=activeContests
 
Good luck!


- The TopCoder Software Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of new TopCoder development opportunities. If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'. In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails. Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.
